<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ux_theme"><sys_ux_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><name>Inventory Tracker Portal Theme</name><parent display_value="Default">a309795273230010fd843c78caf6a724</parent><sys_class_name>sys_ux_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>!!!sys_id_61!!!</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_name/><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_scope><sys_update_name/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><theme>{  
    "--now-font-family": "Roboto",
    "--now-display-type--font-family": "Cabin",
    "--now-display-type_label--font-family": "Roboto",
    "--now-display-type_value--font-family": "Roboto",
    
    "--now-color--primary-0": "218,229,233",
    "--now-color--primary-1": "11,83,110",
    "--now-color--primary-2": "9,63,83",
    "--now-color--primary-3": "6,42,55",
    "--now-color--secondary-0": "218,229,233",
    "--now-color--secondary-1": "11,83,110",
    "--now-color--secondary-2": "9,63,83",
    "--now-color--secondary-3": "6,42,55",
	"--now-canvas-header-container--background-color": "41,62,64",
    
    "--now-button--primary--border-width": "0",
    "--now-button--primary--color": "var(--now-color--neutral-18)",
    "--now-button--primary--color--hover": "var(--now-color--neutral-18)",
    "--now-button--primary--color--active": "var(--now-color--neutral-18)",
    "--now-button--primary--background-color": "247,116,88",
    "--now-button--primary--background-color--hover": "186,87,66",
    "--now-button--primary--background-color--active": "124,58,44",
    "--now-button--secondary--border-color": "247,116,88",
    "--now-button--secondary--border-color--hover": "247,116,88",
    "--now-button--secondary--border-color--active": "247,116,88",
    "--now-button--secondary--color": "var(--now-color--neutral-18)",
    "--now-button--secondary--color--hover": "var(--now-color--neutral-18)",
    "--now-button--secondary--color--active": "var(--now-color--neutral-18)",
    "--now-button--secondary--background-color": "var(--now-color--neutral-0)",
    "--now-button--secondary--background-color--hover": "254,234,230",
    "--now-button--secondary--background-color--active": "254,234,230",
    "--now-button--background-color--disabled": "247,116,88",
    "--now-button--tertiary--color": "var(--now-color--primary-1)",
    "--now-color--inventory--background-color": "233,250,253",
    "font-family": "Roboto",
    "--now-heading--header-primary--font-family": "Cabin",
    "--now-heading--header-secondary--font-family": "Cabin",
    "--now-heading--header-tertiary--font-family": "Cabin",
    "--now-card-header_heading--primary--font-family": "Cabin",
    "--now-breadcrumbs--color--current": "var(--now-color--primary-1)",
    "--now-breadcrumbs--color": "var(--now-color--primary-1)",
    "--now-breadcrumbs--font-weight": "600",
    "--now-heading--header-primary--font-weight": "bold",
    "--now-heading--header-secondary--font-weight": "bold",
    "--now-line-height-crop--before": "-0.2125em",
	"--now-line-height-crop--after": "-0.275em"
 }</theme></sys_ux_theme></record_update>
